sense.def:
To supply someone with something
pomeni nekomu nekaj priskrbeti.

seg.quote: I can supply you with food and drink.
Germany is supplying the steel for the new pipeline.

sense.def:
A supply of something
je količina nečesa, ki nam je na voljo za uporabo.

seg.quote: Bill had his own supply of whisky.
Most houses now have lavatories and a hot water supply.

sense.def:
Supplies
so hrana, oprema in druge stvari, ki jih potrebuje skupina ljudi, na primer vojska ali raziskovalna odprava.

seg.quote: The plane had been ferrying military supplies over the border.

sense.def:
Supply
je to, da proizvajalci izdelujejo in ponujajo blago in usluge.

seg.quote: Economic stability can be reached if supply and demand are balanced.

sense.def:
Kadar je nekaj
in short supply
, je tistega malo ali ga sploh ni mogoče dobiti.
